coexistence_simulator.rf_system_blocks.blocks.modulation_block.chirp_modulation_block

Linear‑chirp modulator / demodulator block.

The class can either generate a complex baseband chirp or remove the chirp (de‑chirp) from a received signal by mixing with the conjugate reference.

Typical use

>>> chirp = ChirpModulation(bandwidth=20e6, duration=40e-6, sampling_rate=200e6)
>>> tx = chirp.process(operation="modulate")
>>> rx_bb = chirp.process(input_signal=rx, operation="demodulate")

Classes

ChirpModulation([bandwidth, duration, ...])

Generate or remove a linear frequency‑modulated chirp.
